I'm fighting to protect the Senate's unique and necessary place within our government that is truly the envy of the world. https://t.co/c3imTM1Z2D

1481273334843195401.text: President Biden’s spending spree has driven inflation to 40-year highs. He must abandon his partisan agenda. Arkansans shouldn’t be forced to pay more to heat their homes, fuel their cars & feed their families because of the reckless policies of this administration.

1481023022857437190.text: I hope the Senate can move on – in a bipartisan way – to addressing the challenges our country is facing, and finding solutions that actually help Americans facing real-world problems instead of spending any more time on partisan threats to upend this body’s traditions.

1481023021385195522.text: These common sense safeguards are not an existential threat to our nation, nor do they warrant breaking the Senate and being unconstitutionally superseded.

1481023020160499713.text: Democrats want to bring the full weight of the federal government down on states like Arkansas that have sought to protect election integrity by instituting voter ID, blocking ballot harvesting, or ensuring the accuracy of voter rolls.

1481023018855972869.text: The ability to prevent radical, swift and far-reaching changes that would surely sow confusion and uncertainty is invaluable. As such, I intend to continue protecting the filibuster.

1481023017513889795.text: Preserving the filibuster and blocking a federal elections takeover: I know how unmistakably important it is to protect the rights of the minority and the interests of individual states – especially those like Arkansas that are more rural and less populated.
